title: Kadhal Oru Butterfly English Lyrics  Ok Ok
stanzas:
Singers: Aalaap Raju, Hemachandran, Sunitha Sarathy
Song:  Kadhal oru butterfly
Lyrics : Na MuthuKumar
Movie: Oru Kal Oru Kannadi (Ok Ok)


Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Vantha thottuko thottuko
paniva pattuko pattuko
mudinja ottiko ottiko
kannaal othuko othuko
tholaal thothiko thothiko
thaniya kathiko kathiko

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal adhu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Siru pillai pole pinnale ohdu
kaanamal ponal kannale thedu

yemaatra paarkum pala murai
endraalum maatum oru murai
engedhan pogum adhu varai
poda nee kadhal varum varai

(vantha thottuko ..)

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal adhu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Nee ennai paarkum kudhookalathil
naan unnai paarpen paravasathil

Mazhai pozhiyaatho,nenjam ninaiyaatho
mana kadalukulley,alai adikaatho
Manathai solla vantha nerathil
en nenjai kattinaai adai kamabathil
Kulir paarvai vanthu ennai anaikaatho
andha alaipinale uyir pizhaikaatho

Minsaaram mele kai vaithu vitten
aanalum kanne virumbi thaan thottaen
kadikaaram pole nam snegam enben
iru ullam serum neram
ethirpaathu ninrenae

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal adhu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Thondailukul sikkuthe oru vaarthai
sollamal pookuthe en vaazhkai
Unnai thoda vanthen
naan theenda villai
manjal kotai vittu kaal thaandavillai

paneerai thuvuthe oru paarvai
vinmeenai thuvuthe maru paarvai
intha idaiveligal yen kuraiya villai
un kadai vizhiyil yen karunai illai

Ketkaamal unnai,
naan kaadhal seithen
karum paarai,
meethu mazhaiyaaga peithen
penne un ullam ennendru solven
pala kallai veesi
paarthum udaiyatha kannaadi

kadhal oru butterfly pola varum
vanthaal athu kannamoochi aadi vidum

Siru pillai pole pinnale oodu
kaanamal ponal kannale thedu

yemaatra paarkum pala murai
endraalum maatum oru murai
engedhan pogum adhu varai
poda nee kadhal varum varai
(vantha thottuko ..)

Vantha thottuko …

English Translation
I tried my best :)

If its comes, touch it touch it
Humbly, hold it hold it
If possible, stick to it
In eyes, agree it agree it
In shoulders, hang up
Alone ?, scream yourself

Love comes like a butterfly
If it comes, it ‘ll play hide & seek

Go behind it like a child
If it hides, search with ‘ur eyes

It will cheat you many times
But you will get it sometime
Until then, Where it can go ?
You go until it comes to you

(If it comes…)

Love comes like a butterfly
If it comes, it ‘ll play hide & seek

When you see me in joy
I see me with excitement

Won’t it rain? And wet the heart
In heart’s sea, won’t waves hit?
When I came to tell my mind
You tied my heart in burning wood
Won’t ur freezing look call me?
Won’t it get life after calling me?

I kept hand on current,
But I touched it intentionally
Our relationship is like clock
I waited for the two hands
in clock to merge into one

Love comes like a butterfly
If it comes, it ‘ll play hide & seek

One word stuck in my throat
My life blooms without any sign
I came to touch you
but not for teasing
I didn’t go beyond the limits

One look sprinkles holy water
Another look sprinkles stars
Why is this same distance?
Why no mercy on your eyes?

Without asking you,
I loved you
I rained myself on
Your mind rock
What kind of mind is yours?
Even after throwing many stones
It is like a unbroken mirror

Love comes like a butterfly
If it comes, it ‘ll play hide & seek

Go behind it like a child
If it hides, search with ‘ur eyes

It will cheat you many times
But you will get it sometime
Until then, Where it can go ?
You go until it comes to you
(If it comes…)

(If it comes…)
